item1:
从立库取出空托盘
Retrieval empty pallets from AS/RS
item2:
空托盘可堆叠入立体库暂存，需要时可执行此作业产生空托盘出库搬运命令
Empty pallets can be stacked into the AS/RS storage. This operation can be performed when needed to generate empty pallets out of the AS/RS.
item4:
立库有暂存的空托盘
AS/RS has empty pallets storage .
item5:
指定的储位或需要的空托盘数量
Specified storage bin location or number of empty pallets required
输出
item6:
空托盘出库搬运命令
Empty pallet transfer out command
异常处里
item7:
如果输入指定的空托盘储位并非空托盘储位，系统将提示查无空托盘储位信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q090 Location Usage Status Query作业查询空托盘所在储位；或不指定空托盘储位，改输入需求空托盘数
If the specified empty pallet storage bin location is not an empty pallet storage bin location, the system prompts that there is no empty pallet storage bin location information. The user can run the Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query job to query the storage bin location of the empty pallet; or do not specify an empty pallet storage bin location. Input pallet storage bin location quantity of empty pallets required
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入指定的空托盘所在储位或需要的空托盘数量二者只能输入一个
Enter the designated empty pallet storage bin location or the required number of empty pallets. Only one can be entered.
2. 输入指定的空托盘所在储位就会清除需要的空托盘数量
Entering the designated empty pallet storage bin location will clear the required number of empty pallets.
3. 输入需要的空托盘数量就会清除指定的空托盘所在储位
Entering the required number of empty pallets will clear the storage bin location of the specified empty pallets
4. 点选功能菜单Query可显示空托盘暂存数据清单，并显示总储位数与总托盘数
Click the function menu Query to display the empty pallet data list, and display the total storage bin location quantity and the total number of pallets.
5. 点选功能菜单Execute可产生空托盘出库搬运命令是否成功或失败的提示
Click the function menu Execute to generate a prompt for the success or failure of the empty pallet transfer out command.
6. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click the function menu Refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state.
7. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu Exit or close the window to end this operation
后置条件
item9:
WCS执行空托盘出库搬运命令
WCS executes empty pallet transfer out command
备注
item10:
从立库出库的空托盘随即解绑整叠与父托盘绑定的关系
The empty pallets delivered from the AS/RS are then unbound and the binding relationship between the stack and the parent pallet is untied
